writer.name: 布鲁诺·伯茨多 Bruno Bozzetto

introduction: 意大利动画导演Bruno Bozzetto的“罗西先生系列”动画短片之一。“罗西先生系列”主要有以下短片：The Mr. Rossi short films were as follows (Original Italian titles in parenthesis):1、罗西先生获奖：An Award for Mr Rossi (1960) (Un Oscar per il Signor Rossi)2、罗西先生去滑雪：Mr Rossi goes Skiing (1963) (Il Signor Rossi va a sciare)3、罗西先生在海边：Mr Rossi at the Seaside (1964) (Il Signore Rossi al mare)4、罗西先生买车：Mr Rossi Buys a Car (1966) (Il Signor Rossi compra l'automobile)5、罗西先生去野营：Mr Rossi at Camping (1970) (Il Signor Rossi al camping)[此片imdb未收录]6、罗西先生的摄影旅游：Mr Rossi at the Safari (1971) (Il Signor Rossi al safari fotografico)7、罗西先生在威尼斯：Mr Rossi in Venice (1974) (Il Signor Rossi a Venezia)[此片imdb未收录]
